characters.title: Karakter
characters.message: Impor riwayat pertemuan untuk melihat karakter yang sudah dimiliki.
characters.introduction: Dalam Wuthering Waves, {name} adalah karakter langka {rarity}★ dari elemen {attribute} yang menggunakan {weaponType} jenis senjata.
characters.skillPriorityDescription: Di bawah ini Anda dapat menemukan urutan leveling kemampuan untuk {name}.

codes.title: Kode Hadiah
codes.howToRedeem: How to Redeem Wuthering Waves Codes
codes.howToRedeemGuide: In-game menu, click the settings icon in the bottom right corner. Select the "Other Settings" tab with the spanner symbol. Hit the "Redeem" button next to the "Redemption Code" under Account.
codes.redeemRequirementGuide: You must be at least Union Level 2 and completing the Chapter 1, Act 1 "Utterance of Marvels: I" main quest.

comments.empty: Tinggalkan komentar agar suara Anda didengar terlebih dahulu.

commit.successfully: Thank you for your contribution, your request has been sent and is being reviewed.

convene.message: Wuthering Waves will delete convene history after 6 months, back up your convene history now!

import.title: Import Convenes
import.invalidLink: Invalid link, please check it again

2.title: Tempel teks yang disalin di sini

1.title: Buka Wuthering Waves di PC ini lalu buka riwayat pertemuan di dalam game dan tunggu hingga dimuat.

2.title: Tekan MULAI pada keyboard Anda, lalu cari Powershell
2.content: Buka {windowsPowerShell} dan jalankan perintah berikut (Tempel jalur game Anda jika diminta).

3.title: Tempelkan URL Convene Record ke dalam kotak di bawah.

1.title: Bagaimana jika saya mengimpor banyak akun berbeda?
1.content: Jangan khawatir, saat Anda mengimpor beberapa akun, kami akan membaginya secara otomatis dan Anda akan melihat tombol alih akun muncul.

2.title: Why not updating the record?
2.content: There is a 30-minute delay for record updates. If no data is shown on this page, please try again later. Convene displayed time zone:America(UTC-5); Europe(UTC+1); Asia,HMT, SEA(UTC+8).

3.title: Apakah akun saya aman?
3.content: Ya, melalui cara import ini tidak akan bisa mengganggu akun anda. Dan yang terakhir website ini bersifat open source di github anda bisa melihat dan mengevaluasinya sendiri, jika masih kurang percaya anda bisa melewati fitur ini dan menggunakan fitur lainnya.

history.title: Pity Tracker
history.empty: Saat ini Anda tidak memiliki Riwayat Pertemuan.

rank.title: Your Global Rank
rank.more: You have more pull than {percentage}% users
rank.less: You have less pull than {percentage}% users

desktopApp.title: Desktop App
desktopApp.introduce: With the desktop app, you can import your convene history automatically, view live maps in-game, view item information, and more.

messages.1: Thank you! Hope you find it useful.
messages.2: I made this website for fun when I have some spare time. I will add more features and update the data every update, because I like to explore the game and I'm kind of min-maxing it.
messages.3: If you want to donate, your donation will definitely help on improving the site and motivating me to add more stuff to me! Thank you very much and have fun, hope you like it!
messages.4: If you like coding, you can also contributing to the project on Github.

pinCluster.title: Pin Cluster
pinCluster.description: Saat diaktifkan, pin dari kategori yang sama akan dikelompokkan untuk mengurangi lag.

hideMarkedPins.title: Sembunyikan Pin yang Ditandai
hideMarkedPins.description: Jika diaktifkan, pin yang ditandai akan disembunyikan di halaman beranda.

multipleAccounts.description: Untuk menyimpan yang ditandai antar akun yang berbeda, Anda hanya perlu mengimpor data pertemuan lalu Anda akan melihat tombol alih akun muncul.

pinCluster.description: Secara default, fitur Pin Cluster akan diaktifkan. Anda dapat mematikannya di pengaturan.

meta.title: Wuthering Waves
meta.description: Pity tracker, todo list, database, analysis, global stats and more for Wuthering Waves!

timeline.title: Event timeline calendar
timeline.description: Wuthering Waves event timeline calendar, view when an event order will start and end with neat timeline.

echoes.title: Echoes

id.description: {name} is a {rarity} Class Echo in Wuthering Waves.

echoes.description: Explore the world of Echoes on wutheringwaves.app for Wuthering Waves. Our site helps you find the best Echo builds for your characters, providing detailed information on their characteristics, related items, and more. Optimize your gameplay by discovering the perfect Echo combinations and strategies to enhance your characters' performance in the game!

id.title: {name} Guide and Build
id.description: {name} is a playable {attribute} Congenital Resonator in Wuthering Waves. Find their best builds, teams, rotations, and other information here.

characters.description: Discover the complete Wuthering Waves character guides at wutheringwaves.app. Here you'll find information on materials to summon, the best echoes, optimal team combinations, and much more. Our detailed guides will help you find the perfect builds for your characters and optimize your gaming experience, making it even more fun.

id.description: {name} is a {type} weapon in Wuthering Waves, obtainable through the game's Convene system. On wutheringwaves.app, our detailed map will assist you in finding ascension materials and tracking your weapon's rank. Discover the best ways to upgrade and utilize {name} to its fullest potential.

weapons.title: Senjata
weapons.description: Ada lima jenis senjata di Wuthering Waves, yaitu Sword, Broadblade, Gauntlet, Pistols dan Rectifier.

codes.title: Kode Hadiah untuk {time}
codes.description: Semua kode yang dapat Anda tukarkan di Wuthering Waves untuk mendapatkan hadiah gratis.

history.title: Pity Tracker
history.description: Convene Counter to track your pity counter and track when you get the character or weapon. You can also automatically import the logs and backup it from PC, Android, iOS, PlayStation then save it more than 6 months.

global.title: Global Convene Stats
global.description: Wuthering Waves Convene Global average pity percentage from wutheringwaves.app users.

todoList.description: Daftar Todo Wuthering Waves untuk merencanakan dan melacak item dan mora yang Anda butuhkan, Anda juga dapat melihat perkiraan resin yang diperlukan untuk menanam item!

tierList.description: Temukan daftar Tingkat Wuthering Waves terbaik Anda di sini atau buat daftar tingkat Anda sendiri. Pelajari tentang semua daftar Wuthering Waves Tier versi terbaru.

trophies.title: Prestasi
trophies.description: Track your Wuthering Waves trophies easily! Complete list of all trophies and their details.

map.title: Peta Interaktif
map.description: Wuthering Waves adalah game dunia terbuka. Peta interaktif baru kami sekarang sudah aktif, memungkinkan Anda melacak kemajuan Anda dan mencapai eksplorasi 100%!

items.title: Semua barang
items.description: Discover detailed information on items for characters, weapons, echoes, and more. Find out where to obtain the necessary resources to level up your characters, enhance your weapons, and improve your echoes. Our in-depth descriptions will help you make the most of all available items to maximize your gameplay experience.

description.default: {name} di Gelombang Wuthering. Pelajari di mana menemukan {name} dan informasi lainnya dalam panduan ini!
description.recipe: {name} di Gelombang Wuthering. Pelajari di mana resep {name} dan informasi lainnya dalam panduan ini!

leaderboards.title: Papan peringkat
leaderboards.description: Papan peringkat kerusakan Wuthering Waves, berbagi profil, generator kartu karakter, dan banyak lagi.

roles.title: Peran Anda
roles.message: Anda telah berhasil menautkan ke Discord.
roles.setupGuide1: Setelah bergabung dengan Discord, Anda perlu mengirim pesan langsung dengan konten di bawah ini ke BOT bernama "{name}".
roles.setupGuide2: Anda akan menerima kode verifikasi dari BOT, salin dan tempel di sini.
roles.emptyRoles: Anda belum memiliki peran apa pun!

syncData.title: Sync data
syncData.introduce: We uses the Cloudflare R2 to save and sync your data on Cloud. We can only read and write files that this site created.

exportData.title: Export data
exportData.introduce: You can download your convene data for backup or move it to another site.

importData.title: Import data
importData.introduce: You can import data from other sites.

eraseData.title: Erase All Data
eraseData.introduce: Your data will clear in your browser and cloud sync. If website doesn't work or has errors, you can use this feature to fix it.

confirm.title: BAHAYA!!!
confirm.message: Your data will clear in your browser and cloud sync.
